name: Lua Expression
description: Evaluates a single line of Lua code to process CV or audio signals. Useful for simple math operations or custom signal manipulation without needing a full script.

specifications.name: Expressions
specifications.description: The number of independent expressions to evaluate.

parameters.name: Input a
parameters.description: The bus to use for variable a.

parameters.name: Input a mode
parameters.description: Whether the input is interpreted as a voltage (a floating point number in the expression) or a logic input (a boolean value in the expression).

parameters.name: Input b
parameters.description: The bus to use for variable b.

parameters.name: Input b mode
parameters.description: Whether the input is interpreted as a voltage (a floating point number in the expression) or a logic input (a boolean value in the expression).

parameters.name: Input c
parameters.description: The bus to use for variable c.

parameters.name: Input c mode
parameters.description: Whether the input is interpreted as a voltage (a floating point number in the expression) or a logic input (a boolean value in the expression).

parameters.name: Input d
parameters.description: The bus to use for variable d.

parameters.name: Input d mode
parameters.description: Whether the input is interpreted as a voltage (a floating point number in the expression) or a logic input (a boolean value in the expression).

parameters.name: Input e
parameters.description: The bus to use for variable e.

parameters.name: Input e mode
parameters.description: Whether the input is interpreted as a voltage (a floating point number in the expression) or a logic input (a boolean value in the expression).

parameters.name: Input f
parameters.description: The bus to use for variable f.

parameters.name: Input f mode
parameters.description: Whether the input is interpreted as a voltage (a floating point number in the expression) or a logic input (a boolean value in the expression).

parameters.name: Input g
parameters.description: The bus to use for variable g.

parameters.name: Input g mode
parameters.description: Whether the input is interpreted as a voltage (a floating point number in the expression) or a logic input (a boolean value in the expression).

parameters.name: Input h
parameters.description: The bus to use for variable h.

parameters.name: Input h mode
parameters.description: Whether the input is interpreted as a voltage (a floating point number in the expression) or a logic input (a boolean value in the expression).

parameters.name: Output
parameters.description: The bus to use for the expression output.

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector.

parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description: Enables evaluation of the expression.

parameters.name: Expression
parameters.description: The Lua expression to evaluate. Inputs are available as variables a-h.

parameters.name: Rate
parameters.description: Whether the expression is evaluated at control rate or audio rate.

output_ports.name: Output
output_ports.description: Result of the evaluated Lua expression.
